alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; James City; Mathews; Middlesex; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gloucester, southeastern Middlesex, central Isle of Wight, York, Mathews, southeastern James City, and Surry Counties, the City of Poquoson, the City of Hampton, the City of Newport News and the City of Williamsburg through 545 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hartfield to near Queens Lake to near Elberon. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Queens Lake and Hartfield around 500 PM EDT. Deltaville, Blakes, York Terrace and Carver Gardens around 505 PM EDT. Busch Gardens around 510 PM EDT. Grove and Gwynn around 515 PM EDT. Mathews, Gloucester Point and Wicomico around 520 PM EDT. Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Lee Hall and Mobjack around 525 PM EDT. Newport News, Achilles and Fort Eustis around 530 PM EDT. Seaford, Patrick Henry Field, Denbigh and Bavon around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Pons, Carrollton, Lackey, Chippokes State Park, Beulah, Moon, Longview, Laban, Camp Peary and Naxera. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; James City; Mathews; Middlesex; Newport News; York
